teal.modules.general 0.6.0
  • Reference

Stack Plots of variables and show association with reference variable

tm_g_association.Rd

Stack Plots of variables and show association with reference variable

tm_g_association(label = "Association", dataname, var,
  show_association = TRUE, plot_height = c(600, 400, 5000),
  pre_output = NULL, post_output = NULL, with_show_r_code = TRUE)

Arguments

label

label shown in the navigation for the item
dataname

(character) data set name to analyze
var

(choices_selected) TODO
show_association

(logical) TODO
plot_height

(numeric) vector with three elements defining selected, min and max plot height
pre_output

optional, shiny.tag with text placed before the output to put the output into context. For example the helpText elements are useful.
post_output

optional, shiny.tag with text placed before the output to put the output into context. For example the helpText elements are useful.
with_show_r_code

(logical) Whether show R Code button shall be enabled

Examples


library(random.cdisc.data)
ASL <- radsl(seed = 1)

app <- init(
  data = cdisc_data(ASL = ASL),
  modules = root_modules(
    tm_g_association(
      dataname = "ASL",
      var = choices_selected(names(ASL), "AGE")
    )
  )
)
#> |apply filter for ASL
#> |** UI id for modules is teal_modules.root
#> |UI id for module is teal_modules_root.Association


# NOT RUN {
shinyApp(app$ui, app$server)
# }
